reasoning: Primary analyst dismissed under due to Kings' bad defense, but injury-adjusted total is 204.1 — a massive 19.4-point edge. reasoning: Injury-adjusted total is 212.3 — a 12.2-point edge on the 224.5 line. Gordon (17.5 PPG) and Watson (14.4 PPG) out for Denver = 31.9 PPG missing. skip_reason: Under 224.5 has 12-point edge but Denver's injuries (Gordon/Watson) are less catastrophic than other games. Spread edge of 2.7 points is marginal. Passing for cleaner plays.

skip_reason: Vetoed: Kelly recommended is $0 for good reason - the math doesn't support this bet. At -199 odds, you need ~66.6% to break even. Ratings_edge performs well but not at heavy juice like this.
